thread.title_full: Ground News - Israel must cease hostilities and bring the hostages home

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Israel must cease hostilities and bring the hostages home
text:
Summary by Ground News Hezbollah is just as dedicated to Israel 's destruction and to October 7-style atrocities as Hamas, but more lethal. Its increasing missile and drone attacks, and Lebanon's passivity, justify broad retaliation by Israel, including a ground invasion, in self-defence. Share menu More
